articles.author: Ketrin Jochecová
articles.title: Ukraine slams India’s Modi for endorsing Putin home attack claims - politico.eu
articles.description: Kyiv denies Moscow’s accusation it targeted the Russian president’s residence.
articles.content: Russias Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov on Monday accused Ukraine of launching 91 drones against Putins official residence in the Novgorod region, which lies between Moscow and St. Petersburg. Lavrov … [+1233 chars]
